title: Weird Disconnect
body: So I disconnected during a ranked game and to try and reconnect I closed the game and reopened it but when I did that there was no screen to let me reconnect to the game does anyone know whats going on?

replies.body: It sounds like a disappearing game, so it's kind of like it never existed.  If that's the case, we've received a few reports and are investigating it.  I don't have any further details to offer right now, but I appreciate the heads up!
Yea, this happened to me as well about 2-3 minutes ago in an ARAM. Thought it was just me lol
The same thing just happened to me, in a ranked game, disconnected so I closed both the game and client, no reconnect option.
